data.weather: Race 5 & 7: -24yds Race 6: +78yds We have had a dry and sunny week, albeit cold, with frosts on Sunday, Monday and Tuesday nights. Warmer morning on Thursday, with cloud cover and no wind. dry overnight into Friday. Dry and overcast on Friday. Light dampening of rain on Friday evening, but nothing measurable. Forecast for Saturday is dry with sunny spells and 7C.

data.rail: We will be operating SHARED bends at both ends of the course this week, utilising the STEEPLECHASE bend at the 'away' bend. The A1 bend remains +9yds out from its 'official distance' location. The 'away' bend is +6yds from the 'official distance' position as a dedicated Chase bend, therefore the 'hurdle' races are effectively 17yds less than the official line. Race distances are affected as follows: Race 1: +3yds Race 2: +66yds Race 3: -48yds Race 4: +39yds
